name: Old Greenwood Golf Course
description: The Golf Academy at Old Greenwood Northern California’s finest learning facility, dedicated to improving your game. At the heart of our facility is a 1,500 square foot golf school building complete with the most technologically-advanced computerized swing analysis system available. Our performance-based curriculum, created by Keith Lyford, one of the nation’s top teachers, is designed to build your game and your confidence.

faqs.question: What’s included in Old Greenwood golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: What do Old Greenwood group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Pricing varies by season, lodging, and group size. Typical ranges are $179–$399 per golfer.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and transportation for corporate and leisure groups.

bodyText: Play Old Greenwood in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.

Here is your chance to play where the pros play, the home of the PGA Tour’s Barracuda Championship! Situated just outside the historic town of Truckee, Old Greenwood rivals that of other Nicklaus masterpieces. Magnificent views of the surrounding mountain peaks add an element of majesty found only in the Sierra.

BARRACUDA CHAMPIONSHIP PGA TOUR GOLF TOURNAMENT
The 27
th
annual Barracuda Championship returns to Tahoe Mountain Club’s Old Greenwood July 17 – 20, 2025.  Golf fans can enjoy a lineup of unforgettable ways to experience the course beyond the fairways. As the area’s only PGA TOUR event, the highly anticipated tournament will showcase world-class golf, a host of big names and plenty to do “outside of the ropes.”
The Barracuda Championship is not just for serious golf fans. There’s an array of sights, sounds, and interests for people looking to enjoy the summer weather with delicious food, refreshing drinks and family-friendly activities.
The 27th annual Barracuda Championship, an official PGA TOUR event, takes place July 17-20, 2025, at Old Greenwood in Truckee, Calif. For more information or to purchase tickets, visit
www.BarracudaChampionship.com
.

pointOfView: There are few courses that leave a marked memory like Old Greenwood does! Jack Nicklaus outdid himself with this design. Cut through massive Ponderosa Pines over rolling terrain, the layout could not be more challenging, but equally satisfying. The course is big and beautiful and demands the absolute best of your game in all phases to score low. The greens are fair sized, but multiple tiers, speedy conditions, and subtle breaks will have you relieved with a two-putt par. Entry points to most greens are narrow, and steep-faced bunkers do their job in penalizing a mis-clubbed approach. Nonetheless, regardless of score, you will be genuinely satisfied, if not giddy, by the beauty, impeccably manicured grounds, and all-around majesty of this jewel! Once will not be enough as you'll surely add Old Greenwood to your annual golf adventure in the Sierras, especially when paired with its sister course, Gray's Crossing. There are no better 36 holes in Northern California!

featuredHole.title: Hole #18 — Par 5
featuredHole.description: Jack Nicklaus designed this dramatic finishing par 5 with the Martis Valley stretching out before you. A creek winds through the fairway, and the green is tucked behind bunkers. A fitting end to one of Tahoe's finest layouts.

testimonials.quote: Our corporate outing at Old Greenwood Golf Course was flawless. Golf the High Sierra coordinated tee times, box lunches, and awards dinner. The course challenged our scratch golfers and was still fun for the high-handicappers.
testimonials.author: David K.

testimonials.quote: Booked Old Greenwood Golf Course as part of a 3-course package with Golf the High Sierra. This was the standout round. Great elevation changes, strategic bunkering, and the staff couldn't have been more welcoming to our group of 20.
testimonials.author: Diego O.

testimonials.quote: Old Greenwood Golf Course delivers every time. This was our third trip and the course keeps getting better. Par 3s are memorable, greens are quick and true. Best value for championship golf in the Truckee, CA area.
testimonials.author: Jennifer R.
